amendment.description: To increase by $1,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Army for research, development, test, and evaluation, to be available for research on and facilitation of technology for converting obsolete chemical munitions to fertilizer, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1559 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1559 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To increase by $1,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated to the Army for research, development, test, and evaluation, to be available for research on and facilitation of technology for converting obsolete chemical munitions to fertilizer, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1559 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1559 proposed by Senator Warner.
